effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
